name: Cowboy (starrylady)
description:
Synopsis

A western game that mimics the Standoff children's hand game where players choose "Reload", "Hold" (which operates as a shield), or "Shoot" in Pokemon-like turn-based combat -- except players and computer pick in simultaneous turns.

Contributors

Yixing Xu: Lead, Programmer, Developer, Designer. Storywriter

Brian Chen: Artist

Scott Cameron: Audio Designer
